users.about: Founded with a mission to enhance scholarship and teaching through the use of digital images and media, Artstor is a nonprofit organization committed to digital collection solutions for universities, museums, schools, and libraries worldwide. Our ever increasing digital library includes more than 1.8 million high-quality images for education and research from a wide variety of collections around the world. We have developed a complete set of tools to catalog, manage, and distribute digital media collections. Artstor is also involved in many community initiatives to further our mission such as the Digital Public Library of America and the Built Works Registry. Our primary goals are to assemble image collections from across many cultures and eras in support of educational and scholarly activities, and to work with the arts and educational communities to develop collective solutions to the challenges of working in a digital environment.
users.name: artstor
